DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate effect oral administration L-arginine muscular fatigue quadriceps , express term Fatigue Resistance Factor ( FRF ) . The secondary purpose study evaluate effect oral administration L-arginine muscular force quadriceps .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Chronic Supplementation L-arginine Muscular Performance
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy young adult sex ; Age 20 55 year ; Slight moderate physical activity , 30 minute per day , least 3 time week ; Exclusion criterion : Cardiac pulmonary disease ; Previous history knee surgery skeletal muscular dysfunction hip , knee ankle joint ; Athletic person ( intensive anaerobic activity ) ; None practice physical activity regularly ; Medications usage The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
